thought.text: I'll help you implement the necessary changes to address the issue described. Let me start by understanding the problem and then work through each phase systematically.

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
task_list.notes: Analyze the issue description and understand the requirements for ITRS to Observed transformations

task_list.title: Phase 2: Set up and run tests
task_list.notes: Install environment and figure out how to run tests

task_list.title: Phase 3: Explore codebase for relevant files
task_list.notes: Find files related to ITRS, AltAz, HADec transformations

task_list.title: Phase 4: Create reproduction script
task_list.notes: Create minimal script to test current behavior and verify the issue

task_list.title: Phase 5: Analyze the fix needed
task_list.notes: Clearly state the problem and solution approach

task_list.title: Phase 6: Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Add the new transformation functions to the appropriate files

task_list.title: Phase 7: Verify the implementation
task_list.notes: Test the fix and ensure it works correctly

task_list.title: Phase 8: Final review and testing
task_list.notes: Ensure all requirements are met and existing tests still pass

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: Read and understand the problem", "status": "todo", "notes": "Analyze the issue description and understand the requirements for ITRS to Observed transformations"}, {"title": "Phase 2: Set up and run tests", "status": "todo", "notes": "Install environment and figure out how to run tests"}, {"title": "Phase 3: Explore codebase for relevant files", "status": "todo", "notes": "Find files related to ITRS, AltAz, HADec transformations"}, {"title": "Phase 4: Create reproduction script", "status": "todo", "notes": "Create minimal script to test current behavior and verify the issue"}, {"title": "Phase 5: Analyze the fix needed", "status": "todo", "notes": "Clearly state the problem and solution approach"}, {"title": "Phase 6: Implement the fix", "status": "todo", "notes": "Add the new transformation functions to the appropriate files"}, {"title": "Phase 7: Verify the implementation", "status": "todo", "notes": "Test the fix and ensure it works correctly"}, {"title": "Phase 8: Final review and testing", "status": "todo", "notes": "Ensure all requirements are met and existing tests still pass"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
